attributes.action: Create a University Ofsted as the OIA is not an independant body
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
NB. This is not like, or even similar to the  'studentrights' petition as that relates the human rights.

Currently Universities have self-governing authority in creating their own rules and regulations (with minimal
standards set by government.)

This is totally unjust and creates an atmosphere of corruption.

The Government states that students can go to the OIA (the Office of Independent Adjudicator for Higher Education) with their complaints however, the OIA is a privately owned
commercial company paid for solely by Universities that subscribe to them; the OIA are not monitored by the government or anyone.

The OIA do not conclude findings of student’s complaints if they deem them to be of Academic Judgement; they can deem this even after a year of investigating a student’s complaint - thus stoping the student from seeking Judicial Review.

The Government need to create Ofsted for higher education a soon as possible.

Why should the Government stop protecting students learning and
the learning environment after secondary school; especially when the students pay for the tuition at University.
